text: -dya#j~jamuqKamEqva puqrastAqdvi yA#tayatiq vyO#ma saptadaqSa iti# dakShiNaqtO &nnaqM ~Mvai vyO#mA&nna(gm)# saptadaqSO&nna#mEqva da#kShiNaqtO dha#ttEq tasmAqd-dakShi#NEqnAnna#madyatE dhaqruNa# Ekaviq(gm)qSa iti# paqScAt pra#tiqShThA vA E#kaviq(gm)qSaH prati#ShThityai BAqntaH pa#~jcadaqSa ityu#ttaraqta OjOq vai BAqnta Oja#H pa~jcadaqSa Oja# EqvOtta#raqtO dha#ttEq tasmA#duttaratO &BiprayAqyI ja#yatiq pratU$rtiraShTAdaqSa iti# puqrastAq- [  ] 12
